title: How to Track a Work Permit Application
steps: Create an ImmiAccount to see the status of an Australian work visa.
Call the immigration center or check online in New Zealand.
Contact your visa application center for British work visas.
Check with a visa agency to see the status of a Chinese visa.
Look up French visa applications online.
Contact the consulate if too much time passes.

title: How to Obtain a Work Permit in Ethiopia
steps: Locate the authority that issues a work permit.
Prepare the right documents.
File application for the permit.
Pay the required service costs.
Follow up the process of your application.
Renew the permit.

title: How to Take a Working Holiday
steps: Determine what kind of visa you need.
Research the minimum requirements for working holiday visas.
Pack for the job and location.
Open a bank account in the country.

title: How to Get a Tourist Visa for Peru
steps: Find out if you need to apply for a tourist visa for Peru.
Check your passport's expiration date.
Fill out the tourist visa application form.
Gather additional materials for your tourist visa application.
Locate your nearest Peruvian embassy or consulate.
Contact a representative at your Peruvian embassy or consulate.
Visit your Peruvian embassy or consulate and submit your tourist visa application.

title: How to Get a Job as a Recreational Activity Supervisor
steps: Get experience in recreational work.
Develop the required supervisory skills.
Obtain proper licensing, as needed.
Look for supervisory positions.
Apply for recreational activity supervisor positions.

title: How to Get a Work Permit
steps: Do some research online.
Obtain the work permit form.
Get all the necessary information and signatures.
Submit your completed form to an issuing officer.
Show your permit to your employer.

title: How to Get a Valet Parking Job
steps: Search for valet jobs.
Fill out an application.
Write a cover letter.
Prepare for an interview.
Show enthusiasm.
Follow up.

title: How to Get a UK Work Permit
steps: Determine which worker category applies to you.
Have a licensed sponsor issue a certificate of sponsorship.
Take the Tier 5 points-based eligibility test.
Apply for your Tier 5 work permit.

title: How to Get a Work Permit and Job
steps: Check if you need a work permit.
Find out if you are eligible for a work permit.
Have a job offer in hand.
Apply for the permit.
Wait for the results.

title: How to Apply for Unemployment Benefits
steps: Contact your state Employment Development Agency.
Apply for UI benefits.
Complete the UI application process.
Appeal the ruling, if necessary.
Attend the One-Stop/Employment Service Office appointment when scheduled.
Fill out your biweekly continued UI claim form.
Keep up with your job search.
To stop collecting unemployment, simply stop filing weekly claims.
